page.title: 02Town Council
page.content: The Mayor's name is Mrs.Hodgson she has been Mayor for three years.She was Shifnal's first lady Mayor;before her there were three men. The town council is made up of fifteen members.The town council is divided up into two sections,the Manor Ward and the Idsall Ward.The Mayor represents the Idsall Ward,there are eight councillors in the Idsall Ward and only seven in the Manor Ward. To elect the Mayor all the councillors have to be at the meeting. These include the deputy mayor,the chairman of finace,deputy chairman,the planning committee chairman,and deputy who have one vote.In the end there are fifteen votes.If you are a member of the public you have to be over eighteen to vote. Being mayor you have several responsibilities.
